name: Forest Rights Implementation Support - Bastar Division
eligibility: Forest-dwelling tribal communities in Bastar region
description: Comprehensive support for implementing Forest Rights Act provisions in Bastar tribal areas

name: Gond Tribal Livelihood Enhancement Program
eligibility: Scheduled Tribes with Individual Forest Rights
description: Enhance livelihood opportunities for Gond tribal communities through sustainable forest-based enterprises

name: Community Forest Resource Management - Dindori
description: Support sustainable management of community forest resources in Dindori tribal belt

name: Patta Distribution Acceleration - Jhabua
eligibility: Pending FRA claimants in Jhabua district
description: Accelerate individual and community forest rights recognition in Jhabua tribal areas

name: Bhil Tribal Education & Rights Awareness
description: Comprehensive awareness programs on forest rights and government schemes for Bhil communities

name: Korku Tribal Development Initiative
eligibility: Korku tribal families in Khandwa region
description: Holistic development program for Korku tribal communities including forest rights and livelihood support

name: Satpura Forest Conservation & Rights
description: Conservation-focused program balancing forest protection with tribal rights in Satpura hills

name: Women Forest Rights Empowerment
description: Empowerment program focusing on women's forest rights and sustainable livelihood practices
